Text: installs allright but when i try to load the game i get a 'A problem has occured. Would you like to save a diagnostic file?' message...
Works fine, no Mal-ware like the last upload. Pretty good game, I like it. Just wish there was more variety among the races. But, all in all a good solid game.

Almost forgot! THANKS ET!

hi 
if u have some problem whit start up just go to d instal folder open options and change in loggin space


# logging
disable log=true
backup old log files=true
angell101 thanks man! That actually did work :D
